Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking with wife. See orange star like object emerge from south east (high altitude 10,000 ft +) appears to maintain altitude. very slowly moving and occasionally appears to stop moving completely. Trajectory aims toward Orions belt and passes past about 2 degrees. Appears to stop completely for approximately 5 minutes.Floating Then begins to move again BACK IN THE DIRECTION IT CAME FROM. Suddenly another identical orage star like object (appears from nowhere) next to first one (for about three sewconds) then suddenly dissappears. Then the first one we had been tracking for the past 25 minutes also vanished.
